changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `players` ( `gsis_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `last_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `full_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `gsis_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `height` int(11) NOT NULL, `number` int(11) NOT NULL, `profile_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `profile_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `weight` int(11) NOT NULL, `years_pro` int(11) NOT NULL, `birthdate` varchar(255), `college` varchar(255), `status` varchar(255), `team` varchar(255), `position` varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY (`gsis_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
